name: Wawp – Instant Order Notifications & OTP Verification for Woocommerce
author: wawp.net

sections.description:
Are you looking to elevate your online business and boost your sales? Look no further than Wawp, the ultimate plugin designed to revolutionize your communication strategy and enhance your customer’s shopping experience.

Wawp is an Instant Order Notifications & OTP Verification Plugin for Woocommerce

With Wawp you can:

  • 🛒 Recover Abandoned Carts: Say goodbye to lost sales by sending personalized notifications via WhatsApp to customers with abandoned carts.
  • 💬 Multilanguage Notifications: Connect with your diverse customer base by sending WooCommerce notifications in multiple languages, making your outreach more inclusive.
  • 🔔 Instant Order Notifications: Receive real-time order notifications directly on WhatsApp, keeping you in the loop and allowing for swift action.
  • 🔒 OTP Verification: Enhance the security of your WordPress login/signup process with OTP verification, ensuring a safe and reliable user experience.

Note: Create your FREE account now, and you will be able to send 50 messages every month for Free.


Advantages of Using Wawp:

🚀 Boost Sales: Recover abandoned carts and increase your conversion rates, giving your revenue a significant lift.

💬 Direct Customer Communication: Establish a direct and quick line of communication with your customers through the widely used WhatsApp platform.

🏆 Competitive Edge: Stand out from the competition by adopting a more user-friendly communication channel, setting your business apart.

🛍 Immersive Shopping Experience: Make your customer’s shopping journey more engaging and immersive with personalized WhatsApp notifications.

📱 Efficient Communication: Reach close to 98% message open rates, outperforming traditional channels such as SMS and email.

🔄 Customer Interaction: Interact effortlessly with your customers, fostering a stronger relationship and improving overall customer satisfaction.

💰 Cost-Effective: Enjoy the benefits without the burden of activation costs, making Wawp a cost-effective solution for your business.

Getting Started with Wawp:

  • 🚀 Install and activate the Wawp plugin.
  • 🌐 Create your FREE account on Wawp.net.
  • 📲 Connect your WhatsApp number.
  • 🔑 Insert the API KEY into the plugin.
  • 🛠 Customize your selected notification messages.
  • ✅ That’s it – you’re ready to boost your sales!

🎁 Special Offer:

Use code “10WP” to enjoy an exclusive 10% discount on our premium plans

Visit Wawp.net | Documentation | Support
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the Wawp – Instant Order Notifications & OTP Verification for Woocommerce plugin and get it working.

Setup from WP-Admin:

  1. In your WordPress Admin, choose Plugins > Add new.
  2. Search for a plugin with the search bar in the top right corner.
  3. After finding the plugin, click Install Now.
  4. To use the plugin. When the installation is finished click Activate.

Manually Upload in WP-Admin:

  1. Download the plugin.
  2. From your WordPress Admin, choose Plugins > Add new.
  3. Click Choose File, locate the plugin .zip file, then click Install Now.
  4. After the installation is complete, click Activate Plugin.

Manually Install Using FTP:

  1. Download the plugin.
  2. Unzip (if it is zipped) and Upload `automation-web-platform` folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
    .
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WP-Admin.

Documentation | Support
